title: Episode 98: The Tragic Unsolved Murder of Lindsay Buziak Mini Morbid
description:
This is a Canadian DOOZY, guys. The twists and turns in this case will have your heads spinning and the absolute senselessness of Lindsay's murder will leave you speechless. A young woman is lured by mysterious strangers to a brutal end while doing her job. Who killed Lindsay Buziak?

Sources:
https://nationalpost.com/news/canada/chilling-confession-taunting-message-from-purported-killer-renews-focus-on-stalled-b-c-murder-probe

https://truecrimedaily.com/2017/06/09/who-killed-lindsay-buziak-realtors-murder-believed-to-be-targeted-hit/

https://www.investigationdiscovery.com/crimefeed/id-shows/still-a-mystery/lindsay-buziak-realtor-murdered-by-phony-house-shoppers-still-a-mystery

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ux4T51IYsUs
